availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Arms Hall in Mason County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1837. Father of William Hall, Isaac Hall, Mason Hall, Julie Ann Hall, Edmund Hall, Martha Hall, George Hall, Sarah E. Hall, Lewis Hall, Emily Hall, and John J. Hall. Farmer in Mason County in 1850. Farmer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 145A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 20-1.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond Kentucky, Mason County, Film #000281842, p. 4 of 496 on Microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
